com.github.cooperroalson.untitled_thinggy_thingg.core.drawing.sprites

Interface Sprite

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    UIComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimationSprite, BackgroundAnimationGameState, Block, ButtonComponent, CheckboxComponent, Dialog, DialogBox, Entity, InteractableEntity, Player, Sign, StringComponent, TextBoxComponent, TextureComponentWrapper, TextureSprite, Tile, UIContainer, UIGameState

    public interface Sprite
    An interface for objects that are drawn to the screen. It generates a List of Drawables It has no concept of position.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Drawable> draw(int x, int y)
      Returns a list of Drawables, which will be subsequently drawn to the screen by the WindowManager

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        java.util.List<Drawable> draw(int x,
                              int y)
        Returns a list of Drawables, which will be subsequently drawn to the screen by the WindowManager
        Parameters:
        x - The x position to draw at
        y - The y position to draw at
        Returns:
        A List of Drawables
